page.title: 19MY TOWN - Epilogue
page.content: { Wigan}is a pretty normal town. The {Pier}is the most famous bit and is under redevelopment. They are building a museum, a pub and some offices. It should attract a lot of tourism into Wigan especially because of George Orwell. Instead of knocking the{Market {Hall}down they should stop building multi-storey car parks and use that money to restore it. Replacing the old hall with a{concrete monster}is utterly stupid. Something could be done to tidy up the place as there are too many derelict buildings. There is not much to do in Wigan for teenagers. We need more youth clubs, discos or new attractions to keep kids off the streets. With{unemployment}as bad as it is, there is hardly any point in going to school.You would think that the council would provide more for people to do in the daytime.
